languages.text: Allies affected by the Navy Officer’s non-attack Archetype abilities or Brace for Impact! gain +{uip|dodge bonus|971073f6852045ca832e54ddc2e19ed4} and don't provoke attacks of opportunity for 1 round. Does not stack.
